snippet: Portugal slumped to a shocking 1-0 home loss to Albania in one of eight opening qualifiers for the 2016 European Championship on Sunday.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Albania upsets Portugal, 1-0, in 2016 European Championship qualifier; other soccer results noted.
lead_paragraph: Portugal slumped to a shocking 1-0 home loss to Albania in one of eight opening qualifiers for the 2016 European Championship on Sunday.

headline.main: Albania Upsets Portugal in Qualifier for 2016 European Championship
headline.print_headline: Portugal Is Upset by Albania in First Euro 2016 Qualifier
